item.title: A Family Dollar store’s roof collapsed and killed a 68-year-old man two days after someone reported the building ‘slowly tilting’
item.description: Three people were also injured by the partial collapse of the building.

item.title: IPOs are hot again. How investors can avoid a 2021 style hangover
item.description: The public offerings of one-time darlings like Rivian and Roblox offer a cautionary tale.

item.title: Paul Dans, Project 2025’s chief architect, says the U.S. Senate is ‘the headwaters of the swamp’
item.description: Dans plans to challenge Sen. Lindsey Graham in South Carolina, adding "it's time to show him the door."

item.title: Samsung’s chip business just scored its biggest deal from a single customer ever, courtesy of Elon Musk
item.description: Tesla is up 0.2%, and Samsung's stock in South Korea jumped 6.8%, as U.S. stocks hover near record highs.

item.title: Mira Murati’s record-breaking $2 billion seed round made the impossible possible for female founders
item.description: The former OpenAI CTO is now running Thinking Machines Lab—with $2 billion in her war chest.
